projects.name: Automello
projects.blurb: Designed software which chops up audio into small segments and maps them to musical pitches

projects.name: Real-Time Computer Accompaniment
projects.blurb: Created a real-time musical beat detection algorithm as part of an automatic accompaniment system being created at Carnegie Mellon University

projects.name: Patchwork
projects.blurb: Developed audio signal processing algorithms for a browser-based modular synthesizer

projects.name: Electromagnetically Prepared Piano
projects.blurb: Built an improved version of an electromagnetic string vibration system

projects.name: ooscc - Open Open Sound Control Controller
projects.blurb: Created a modular computer controller implementing the Open Sound Control protocol

projects.name: Synth-in-a-Month
projects.blurb: Constructed an analog modular synthesizer over the course of a month

projects.name: The Starblaster
projects.blurb: Built a hollowbody electric guitar by hand at the Totnes School of Guitarmaking
